titles.title: Lord I Give You My Heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is my desire,
To honour You
Lord with all my heart
I worship You
All I have within me
I give You praise
All that I adore is in You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lord I give You my heart
I give You my soul
I live for You alone
Every breath that I take
Every moment I'm awake
Lord have Your way in me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This is my desire,
To honour You
Lord with all my heart
I worship You
All I have within me
I give You praise
All that I adore
Is in You
